jade.core.persistence
Class FrozenMessageQueue

java.lang.Object
  jade.core.persistence.FrozenMessageQueue

public class FrozenMessageQueue
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the persistent message queue of a frozen JADE agent. It contains the saved agent message queue as it was at the freeze time, and the list of all the ACL messages sent to it ever since.

Author:
Giovanni Rimassa - FRAMeTech s.r.l.
